data.name: S.P.A.T.
data.detailed_description:
You have a unique opportunity to feel like an operator of a special squad to fight paranormal creatures and monsters (Special Paranormal Assault Team - S.P.A.T.).

Single play with AI or team play (up to 3 people in a squad).

Choose Your Equipment Carefully Before a Mission.


You don't know what kind of monsters you have to face. The type of ammo, bait and search devices can all save the lives of you and your teammates on a mission.

Everyone does their job


Everyone in the squad has a role - a searcher, support and hunter. Do your job and the mission will be completed.

Something in the mist


Not only one alpha monster (3 types at this moment - Werewolf, Wendigo and Yeti) is waiting for you in the dark, but also many different minions, be careful!

Be in the light


Not only monsters are dangerous, in the paranormal zone, if you are not in the light, you can lose your mind. Check the indicator on your hand, be in the light, wait for the dawn or blame yourself.

Join Those Who are Already Fighting Monsters!

data.short_description: You have a unique opportunity to feel like an operator of a special squad to fight paranormal creatures and monsters (Special Paranormal Assault Team - S.P.A.T.). Solve challenging problems with unknown monsters in the dark corners of the earth.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Adult content (violence) is available in the game in the form of shooting and killing monsters. There is blood in the game. Violence against human beings is not welcome (because they are teammates), but there is an opportunity to kill another player. There is no nudity or sex scenes in the game.
